title: [RESOLVED] OCE Server Down? Champ select froze.
body:
UPDATE: Riot Gehirn - Thanks guys, I've let someone know about the issue.


Anyone else can't login or had their client freeze?


EDIT: This was posted here instead of "Help & Support" because of a spam bot drowning out any posts. No spam bot anymore.

replies.body:
Thanks guys, I've let someone know about the issue.

UPDATE 1457 AEDT: Seems ISP related. Most likely Optus and Telstra users affected.

UPDATE 1528 AEDT: Players are logging in again and games are starting correctly. Still trying to determine cause of the issue.

UPDATE 1546 AEDT: Issue appears to be resolved. Ranked has been re-enabled.
Ahh right on time, ty!

Can you check now if you can log in and start a custom game?

UPDATE: thanks guys, still working on it.
Client still not opening
Still won't open
Yea the issue is ongoing. Got a team of Rioters trying to figure out the problem. Connection to the log in and game servers does appear to be failing for some players.
Login successful, custom game checks out. Cheers Riot!
Okay, thank you
the error is gone is it fixed?
RANKED IS BACK OMG
ITS WORKING!!!
Tried twice, still can't login. Stuck on authenticating.
I can't even log in :/

I can start a custom, but there is some lag to it

Edit: Can't start a custom now and it says im in a existing game?
No luck...
Can't even login, it seems to be a global issue
i could login once but sever went down again, and i cant log back on
I still can't log in.

> UPDATE 1457 AEDT: Seems ISP related. Most likely Optus and Telstra users affected.

Isn't pretty much all of Australia Telstra & Optus users, or some subset of...? It seems a little unlikely that ISP is the problem. I ran multiple tracerts & pings to your servers, all receiving no packet loss nor inconsistency. Can we get a more in-depth explanation? And are the last few hours of ranked games going to be null? I was kicked from 2 champ selects and lost placements.

> [{quoted}](name=AverBeg,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rGAr0ssj,comment-id=0008000a,timestamp=2016-11-19T04:23:20.545+0000)
>
> Isn't pretty much all of Australia Telstra & Optus users, or some subset of...?

No. You don't know what you're talking about. Leave it to the experts.

> Isn't pretty much all of Australia Telstra & Optus users, or some subset of...**?**

Question mark. That was just the impression I was under, and I was asking a legitimate question. You're right, I'm not sure, but that doesn't bar me from asking for a proper explanation, does it?
our lord and savior has arrived {{summoner:21}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rGAr0ssj,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-11-19T02:47:51.440+0000)
>
> Thanks guys, I've let someone know about the issue.

I demand 1000RP for this.

> UPDATE 1457 AEDT: Seems ISP related. Most likely Optus and Telstra users affected.

If it was ISP related, wouldn't that mean it's not "contained" to LoL but, rather, the users?

I can't speak for anyone else but I've only had trouble with League itself, nothing else was affected.
Thanks
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} TELSTRA!!!!!
HAVING TELSTRA IN 2016 LUL{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Any fix yet? i'm a optus user :(
Does that mean there is nothing you can do?
Riot has been hacked. Also DOWN VOTE HIM.. Asking for upvote. What a loser.
how else do you get their attention

Do what they did on support forum.. SPAM THE HECK OUT OF IT!

I just hate people that ask for up vote. Instead of offering a real reason to up vote.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
dude its so we dont have to spam the f**k out of them if theres already one why make another get everyone on the same page

I guess you never played WoW in vanilla days.
You see.
Once upon a time in a far far far away land. There was a thing called class rep. When the class rep for shamans failed them.
The shamans took it upon them selfs to make sure they got noticed. { not just up voting because someone asked.. }

Then this shaman rep lost his job due to not being able to listen to the shamans.
Due to which he went insane on a public forum because of it.

But hey you up vote.. Hope that with in a day maybe 4 days that it will be up voted enough to get them to want to read it.
While 100+ people making a post about the same thing will get them to read it now.

Power of spam is always more powerful then *coughs upvoting..

P.S
Link to what I was talking about.

http://wowwiki.wikia.com/wiki/Tseric

Except we don't need to spam to get noticed.

You *must* have missed it because Gehrin has *already* taken notice: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/rGAr0ssj-oce-server-down-champ-select-froze?comment=0008
atleast we're relieved of playing against rengars right? heh{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Tried logging on, got stuck on "logging on" for about 5 minutes and then got an "unexpected error".

And now it's back to "logging on"...
Has anyone got an E.T.A on when we can play , its pretty frustrating.
{{champion:78}}  why rito i just wanna play some papi :( {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
RIOT I BELIEVE IN YOU NIKO NIKO NIIIII
Nico Nico Nii
Free Hextech Chest and Key for inconvenience?

i can log in. my league works fine.
Shame scrubs
Why are you here then? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Actually, it *might* be useful info. If the Rioters can compare data from people who are having issues with those who aren't it might give them something they couldn't see with just the data from the players having the issues.
c'moooon it's Saturday i just wanna play! {{item:3151}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3151}}
Cant login stuck on "Authenticating"
is it fixed because i can login now?

Just because *you* can log in doesn't mean it's fixed.

I'm still having trouble logging in and I'm sure there are also quite a few others who are still having issues.
Ok now i'm sick of this shit..... been trying to connect since 7pm last night and still can't connect and it's 8.30 in the morning now.... RIOT can you update us on HOW to fix this?
